content_request: Bienvenue **Assane**
Quel est l'évolution du Chiffre d'affaire

Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT
    T.year AS year,
    T.month AS month,
    SUM(T.daily_ca) AS total_chiffre_affaire
FROM
    (
        SELECT
            rdc.year,
            rdc.month,
            rdc.ca_payg_voix_sms AS daily_ca
        FROM
            reporting_daily_ca_pag_xarre AS rdc
        WHERE
            rdc.year = 2025

        UNION ALL

        SELECT
            rdo.year,
            rdo.month,
            rdo.sous_mnt AS daily_ca
        FROM
            reporting_daily_offer AS rdo
        WHERE
            rdo.year = 2025
    ) AS T
GROUP BY
    T.year,
    T.month
ORDER BY
    T.year DESC,
    T.month DESC;
je veux la segmentation des recharges des clients par départements en 2025

Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT
    dc.year AS year,
    dc.month AS month,
    dc.departement_90j AS departement_90j,
    dc.segment_recharge AS segment_recharge,
    COUNT(DISTINCT dc.msisdn) AS nombre_clients
FROM
    daily_clients AS dc
WHERE
    dc.year = 2025
GROUP BY
    dc.year,
    dc.month,
    dc.departement_90j,
    dc.segment_recharge
ORDER BY
    dc.year DESC,
    dc.month DESC,
    dc.departement_90j ASC,
    dc.segment_recharge ASC;
Quel est la variation du Ca entre 2 mois en 2025

Requête SQL envoyée :

WITH daily_consolidated_ca AS (
    SELECT
        t1.year AS year,
        t1.month AS month,
        t1.sous_mnt AS daily_ca
    FROM
        reporting_daily_offer AS t1
    WHERE
        t1.year = 2025

    UNION ALL

    SELECT
        t2.year AS year,
        t2.month AS month,
        t2.ca_payg_voix_sms AS daily_ca
    FROM
        reporting_daily_ca_pag_xarre AS t2
    WHERE
        t2.year = 2025
),
monthly_ca AS (
    SELECT
        dcc.year AS year,
        dcc.month AS month,
        SUM(dcc.daily_ca) AS total_monthly_ca
    FROM
        daily_consolidated_ca AS dcc
    GROUP BY
        dcc.year,
        dcc.month
)
SELECT
    mc.year AS year,
    mc.month AS month,
    mc.total_monthly_ca AS total_monthly_ca,
    mc.total_monthly_ca - LAG(mc.total_monthly_ca, 1, 0) OVER (PARTITION BY mc.year ORDER BY mc.month) AS ca_variation
FROM
    monthly_ca AS mc
ORDER BY
    mc.year DESC,
    mc.month DESC
donne moi le parc actif Orange du mois Janvier

Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT
    dtpc.year AS year,
    dtpc.month AS month,
    COUNT(DISTINCT dtpc.msisdn) AS active_subscribers_count
FROM
    daily_trafic_par_compteur AS dtpc
WHERE
    dtpc.month = 1 AND dtpc.year = 2025
GROUP BY
    dtpc.year,
    dtpc.month
ORDER BY
    dtpc.year DESC,
    dtpc.month DESC;
quel est l'évolution du parc en Mars

Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT
    daily_trafic_par_compteur.year AS year,
    daily_trafic_par_compteur.month AS month,
    daily_trafic_par_compteur.day AS day,
    COUNT(DISTINCT daily_trafic_par_compteur.msisdn) AS nombre_clients_actifs
FROM
    daily_trafic_par_compteur
WHERE
    daily_trafic_par_compteur.month = '03'
    AND daily_trafic_par_compteur.year = 2025
GROUP BY
    daily_trafic_par_compteur.year,
    daily_trafic_par_compteur.month,
    daily_trafic_par_compteur.day
ORDER BY
    daily_trafic_par_compteur.year DESC,
    daily_trafic_par_compteur.month DESC,
    daily_trafic_par_compteur.day ASC;
quel est le year to date ( YTD) du ca data au mois de Mars

Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT
    T1.year AS year,
    3 AS month,
    SUM(T1.ca_data) AS ca_data_ytd_march
FROM
    reporting_ca_data_monthly AS T1
JOIN
    (SELECT MAX(year) AS max_year FROM reporting_ca_data_monthly) AS T2
ON
    T1.year = T2.max_year
WHERE
    T1.month <= 3
GROUP BY
    T1.year
ORDER BY
    T1.year DESC;
Donne moi le Ca des souscriptions au mois d'Avril

Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT
    rdo.year AS year,
    rdo.month AS month,
    SUM(rdo.sous_mnt) AS ca_souscriptions
FROM
    reporting_daily_offer AS rdo
JOIN
    (SELECT MAX(year) AS max_year FROM reporting_daily_offer) AS max_year_subquery
ON
    rdo.year = max_year_subquery.max_year
WHERE
    rdo.month = 4
GROUP BY
    rdo.year,
    rdo.month
ORDER BY
    rdo.year DESC,
    rdo.month DESC
Quel est l'évolution Year To Date du ca souscription au mois de Mars

Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT
    t1.year AS year,
    t1.month AS month,
    SUM(t1.sous_mnt) AS total_ca_souscription_ytd
FROM
    reporting_daily_offer AS t1
JOIN
    (SELECT MAX(year) AS max_year FROM reporting_daily_offer) AS max_year_subquery
ON
    t1.year = max_year_subquery.max_year
WHERE
    t1.month IN (1, 2, 3)
GROUP BY
    t1.year,
    t1.month
ORDER BY
    t1.year DESC,
    t1.month DESC;
Donne moi le Ca bundle du mois de mai

Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT
    reporting_daily_offer.year AS year,
    reporting_daily_offer.month AS month,
    SUM(reporting_daily_offer.sous_mnt) AS ca_bundle_mai
FROM
    reporting_daily_offer
WHERE
    reporting_daily_offer.month = 5
    AND reporting_daily_offer.year = 2025
GROUP BY
    reporting_daily_offer.year,
    reporting_daily_offer.month
ORDER BY
    reporting_daily_offer.year DESC,
    reporting_daily_offer.month DESC;
Donne moi le Ca des offres bundle du mois de mai

Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT
    T1.year AS year,
    T1.month AS month,
    SUM(T1.sous_mnt) AS total_ca_bundle
FROM
    reporting_daily_offer AS T1
JOIN
    (SELECT MAX(year) AS max_year FROM reporting_daily_offer) AS T2
ON
    T1.year = T2.max_year
WHERE
    T1.month = 5
GROUP BY
    T1.year,
    T1.month
ORDER BY
    T1.year DESC,
    T1.month DESC;
Quel est l'évolution YTD du ca des offres de type bundle au mois de Mars

Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT
    rdo.year AS year,
    rdo.month AS month,
    SUM(rdo.sous_mnt) OVER (PARTITION BY rdo.year ORDER BY rdo.month) AS ca_ytd_bundles
FROM
    reporting_daily_offer AS rdo
JOIN
    (SELECT MAX(year) AS max_year FROM reporting_daily_offer) AS max_year_subquery
ON
    rdo.year = max_year_subquery.max_year
WHERE
    rdo.types = 'BUNDLES'
    AND rdo.month <= 3
ORDER BY
    rdo.year DESC,
    rdo.month DESC;
Donne moi le Ca Pass internet du mois de Janvier

Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT
    rdo.year AS year,
    rdo.month AS month,
    SUM(rdo.sous_mnt) AS total_ca_pass_internet
FROM
    reporting_daily_offer AS rdo
WHERE
    rdo.types LIKE '%PASS INTERNET%'
    AND rdo.month = 1
    AND rdo.year = 2025
GROUP BY
    rdo.year,
    rdo.month
ORDER BY
    rdo.year DESC,
    rdo.month DESC;

Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT
    T1.year AS year,
    T1.month AS month,
    SUM(T1.sous_mnt) AS ca_pass_internet_ytd
FROM
    reporting_daily_offer AS T1
JOIN
    (SELECT MAX(year) AS max_year FROM reporting_daily_offer) AS T2
ON
    T1.year = T2.max_year
WHERE
    T1.types LIKE '%PASS INTERNET%' AND T1.month <= 5
GROUP BY
    T1.year,
    T1.month
ORDER BY
    T1.year DESC,
    T1.month DESC;

Donne moi le Ca pass internationaux du mois de Mars

Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT
    t.year AS year,
    t.month AS month,
    SUM(t.sous_mnt) AS total_ca_pass_internationaux
FROM
    reporting_daily_offer AS t
JOIN
    (SELECT MAX(year) AS max_year FROM reporting_daily_offer) AS max_year_subquery
ON
    t.year = max_year_subquery.max_year
WHERE
    t.types = 'INTERNATIONAL'
    AND t.month = 3
GROUP BY
    t.year,
    t.month
ORDER BY
    t.year DESC,
    t.month DESC;

Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT
    year AS year,
    month AS month,
    SUM(sous_mnt) OVER (ORDER BY month ASC) AS ytd_revenue
FROM
    reporting_daily_offer
WHERE
    types = 'INTERNATIONAL'
    AND month BETWEEN 1 AND 3
    AND year = (SELECT MAX(year) FROM reporting_daily_offer)
GROUP BY
    year,
    month,
    sous_mnt
ORDER BY
    year,
    month;

quel est le parc actif 4G au mois de Mars

Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT
    dib.year AS year,
    dib.month AS month,
    COUNT(DISTINCT dtpc.msisdn) AS active_4g_subscribers
FROM
    daily_infos_bts AS dib
JOIN
    daily_trafic_par_compteur AS dtpc ON dib.day = dtpc.day AND dib.month = dtpc.month AND dib.year = dtpc.year
WHERE
    dib.TYPE_CELLULE = '4G'
    AND dib.month = 3
GROUP BY
    dib.year,
    dib.month
ORDER BY
    dib.year DESC,
    dib.month DESC;
quel est est l'évolution Year To Date du parc actif orange 4G au mois de Mars

Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT
    dtc.year AS year,
    dtc.month AS month,
    COUNT(DISTINCT dtc.msisdn) AS active_4g_subscribers_ytd
FROM
    daily_trafic_par_compteur AS dtc
JOIN
    daily_infos_bts AS dib
ON
    SUBSTR(dtc.day, 1, 6) = CONCAT(dib.year, LPAD(dib.month, 2, '0'))
WHERE
    dib.TYPE_CELLULE = '4G'
    AND dtc.tickettype = 8
    AND dtc.year = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE())
    AND dtc.month <= 3
GROUP BY
    dtc.year,
    dtc.month
ORDER BY
    dtc.year DESC,
    dtc.month DESC;
quel est la pénétration du parc actif 4G au mois de Mars

Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT
    year(date_heure) AS year,
    month(date_heure) AS month,
    date(date_heure) AS date,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN technologie LIKE '%4G%' THEN id_cellule ELSE NULL END) AS count_4g_cellules,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN technologie LIKE '%3G%' THEN id_cellule ELSE NULL END) AS count_3g_cellules,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN technologie LIKE '%2G%' THEN id_cellule ELSE NULL END) AS count_2g_cellules
FROM
    daily_infos_bts
WHERE month(date_heure) = 3
AND year(date_heure) = 2025
GROUP BY
    year(date_heure),
    month(date_heure),
    date(date_heure)
ORDER BY
    date(date_heure) DESC;
quel est l'évolution YTD de la pénétration du parc actif 4G au mois d'Avril

Requête SQL envoyée :

WITH active_4g_users AS (
    SELECT
        dtpc.year AS year,
        dtpc.month AS month,
        COUNT(DISTINCT dtpc.msisdn) AS active_4g_count
    FROM
        daily_trafic_par_compteur AS dtpc
    JOIN
        daily_infos_bts AS dib
    ON
        SUBSTR(dtpc.day, 1, 8) = dib.day
        AND SUBSTR(dtpc.year,1,4) = dib.year
        AND SUBSTR(dtpc.month,1,2) = dib.month
    WHERE
        dib.TYPE_CELLULE = '4G'
        AND dtpc.year = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE)
        AND dtpc.month <= 4
    GROUP BY
        dtpc.year,
        dtpc.month
),
total_active_users AS (
    SELECT
        year AS year,
        month AS month,
        COUNT(DISTINCT msisdn) AS total_active_count
    FROM
        daily_trafic_par_compteur
    WHERE
        year = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE)
        AND month <= 4
    GROUP BY
        year,
        month
)
SELECT
    tau.year AS year,
    tau.month AS month,
    CASE
        WHEN tau.total_active_count = 0 THEN 0
        ELSE a4g.active_4g_count / tau.total_active_count
    END AS penetration_rate
FROM
    total_active_users AS tau
JOIN
    active_4g_users AS a4g
ON
    tau.year = a4g.year AND tau.month = a4g.month
ORDER BY
    tau.year DESC,
    tau.month DESC;
quel est la pénétration des échangers Sargal au mois de Mars

Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT
    rsgd.year AS year,
    rsgd.month AS month,
    rsgd.sargal_subs / dtpc.total_active_subs AS penetration
FROM
    (SELECT
        year,
        month,
        COUNT(DISTINCT nb_subs) AS sargal_subs
    FROM
        reporting_sargal_gift_daily
    WHERE
        month = 3
        AND year = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE)
    GROUP BY
        year,
        month
    ) rsgd
CROSS JOIN
    (SELECT
        year,
        month,
        COUNT(DISTINCT msisdn) AS total_active_subs
    FROM
        daily_trafic_par_compteur
    WHERE
        month = 3
        AND year = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE)
    GROUP BY
        year,
        month
    ) dtpc;
Quelle est l'évolution du ca data par type de souscription data

Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT
    rcdm.year AS year,
    rcdm.month AS month,
    rcdm.SEGMENT_RECHARGE AS segment_recharge,
    rcdm.formule_dmgp AS formule_dmgp,
    SUM(rcdm.ca_data) AS total_ca_data
FROM
    reporting_ca_data_monthly AS rcdm
WHERE rcdm.year = (SELECT MAX(year) FROM reporting_ca_data_monthly)
GROUP BY
    rcdm.year,
    rcdm.month,
    rcdm.SEGMENT_RECHARGE,
    rcdm.formule_dmgp
ORDER BY
    rcdm.year DESC,
    rcdm.month DESC;
Donne moi la répartition du Ca data par DRV

Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT
    reporting_sargal_gift_daily.year AS year,
    reporting_sargal_gift_daily.month AS month,
    reporting_sargal_gift_daily.region_90j AS drv,
    SUM(rdo.sous_mnt) AS ca_data
FROM
    reporting_sargal_gift_daily AS rsgd
JOIN
    reporting_daily_offer AS rdo ON reporting_sargal_gift_daily.ca_cr_commune_90j = rdo.ca_cr_commune_90j
WHERE
    rdo.types = 'PASS INTERNET'
GROUP BY
    reporting_sargal_gift_daily.year,
    reporting_sargal_gift_daily.month,
    reporting_sargal_gift_daily.region_90j
ORDER BY
    reporting_sargal_gift_daily.year DESC,
    reporting_sargal_gift_daily.month DESC;
Donne moi la répartition du Ca recharge par zone DRV

Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT
    rdpm.year AS year,
    rdpm.month AS month,
    'Unknown' AS zone_drv,
    rdpm.SEGMENT_RECHARGE AS segment_recharge,
    SUM(rdpm.parc) AS total_parc
FROM
    reporting_daily_parc_maxit AS rdpm
WHERE rdpm.year = (SELECT MAX(year) FROM reporting_daily_parc_maxit)
GROUP BY
    rdpm.year,
    rdpm.month,
    zone_drv,
    rdpm.SEGMENT_RECHARGE
ORDER BY
    rdpm.year DESC,
    rdpm.month DESC;
Donne moi la répartition du Ca recharge par drv

Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT
    year AS year,
    month AS month,
    SUM(CAST(REPLACE(SEGMENT_RECHARGE, ',', '') AS DOUBLE)) AS total_recharge_revenue
FROM
    reporting_daily_parc_maxit
GROUP BY
    year,
    month
ORDER BY
    year DESC,
    month DESC;
la segmentation Recharge du Client par département en décembre 2024

Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT
    year AS year,
    month AS month,
    departement_90j AS departement,
    segment_recharge AS segment_recharge,
    COUNT(DISTINCT nb_subs) AS nombre_clients
FROM
    reporting_sargal_gift_daily
WHERE
    year = 2024 AND month = 12
GROUP BY
    year,
    month,
    departement_90j,
    segment_recharge
ORDER BY
    departement_90j,
    segment_recharge;
Segmenter les clients selon l’intensité d’usage data (actifs réguliers, occasionnels, inactifs).

Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT
    dc.year AS year,
    dc.month AS month,
    dc.msisdn AS msisdn,
    dc.formule AS formule,
    dc.segment_marche AS segment_marche,
    dc.age AS age,
    dc.sex AS sex,
    SUM(dtpc.trafic) AS total_data_usage_kb,
    CASE
        WHEN SUM(dtpc.trafic) > 10485760 THEN 'Actif Regulier'
        WHEN SUM(dtpc.trafic) BETWEEN 1024000 AND 10485760 THEN 'Occasionnel'
        ELSE 'Inactif'
    END AS usage_segment
FROM
    daily_clients AS dc
JOIN
    daily_trafic_par_compteur AS dtpc ON dc.msisdn = dtpc.msisdn
WHERE
    dtpc.tickettype = 8
    AND dtpc.year = 2025
    AND dc.year = 2025
GROUP BY
    dc.year,
    dc.month,
    dc.msisdn,
    dc.formule,
    dc.segment_marche,
    dc.age,
    dc.sex
ORDER BY
    total_data_usage_kb DESC;
Détecter le top 20 les profils des clients très engagés à valoriser

Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT
    dc.year AS year,
    dc.month AS month,
    dc.msisdn AS msisdn,
    dc.formule AS formule,
    dc.famille_prod AS famille_prod,
    dc.etat_ligne AS etat_ligne,
    dc.date_premiere_activation AS date_premiere_activation,
    dc.date_resiliation AS date_resiliation,
    dc.box AS box,
    dc.formule_dmgp AS formule_dmgp,
    dc.region_90j AS region_90j,
    dc.departement_90j AS departement_90j,
    dc.commune_arrondissement_90j AS commune_arrondissement_90j,
    dc.ca_cr_commune_90j AS ca_cr_commune_90j,
    dc.zone_drv_90j AS zone_drv_90j,
    dc.zone_dvri_90j AS zone_dvri_90j,
    dc.nom_cellule_90j AS nom_cellule_90j,
    dc.region_30j AS region_30j,
    dc.departement_30j AS departement_30j,
    dc.commune_arrondissement_30j AS commune_arrondissement_30j,
    dc.ca_cr_commune_30j AS ca_cr_commune_30j,
    dc.zone_drv_30j AS zone_drv_30j,
    dc.zone_dvri_30j AS zone_dvri_30j,
    dc.nom_cellule_30j AS nom_cellule_30j,
    dc.statut_predit AS statut_predit,
    dc.age AS age,
    dc.sex AS sex,
    dc.segment_recharge AS segment_recharge,
    dc.segment_marche AS segment_marche,
    dc.smartphone AS smartphone,
    SUM(dtpc.trafic) AS total_trafic
FROM
    daily_clients AS dc
JOIN
    daily_trafic_par_compteur AS dtpc ON dc.msisdn = dtpc.msisdn AND dc.year = dtpc.year AND dc.month = dtpc.month
WHERE dc.year = (SELECT MAX(year) FROM daily_clients)
GROUP BY
    dc.year,
    dc.month,
    dc.msisdn,
    dc.formule,
    dc.famille_prod,
    dc.etat_ligne,
    dc.date_premiere_activation,
    dc.date_resiliation,
    dc.box,
    dc.formule_dmgp,
    dc.region_90j,
    dc.departement_90j,
    dc.commune_arrondissement_90j,
    dc.ca_cr_commune_90j,
    dc.zone_drv_90j,
    dc.zone_dvri_90j,
    dc.nom_cellule_90j,
    dc.region_30j,
    dc.departement_30j,
    dc.commune_arrondissement_30j,
    dc.ca_cr_commune_30j,
    dc.zone_drv_30j,
    dc.zone_dvri_30j,
    dc.nom_cellule_30j,
    dc.statut_predit,
    dc.age,
    dc.sex,
    dc.segment_recharge,
    dc.segment_marche,
    dc.smartphone
ORDER BY
    total_trafic DESC
LIMIT 20;
